/* allTabColumnsDAO.selectAllTabColumnsList */ SELECT atc.* , (SELECT comments FROM all_col_comments WHERE owner = atc.owner AND table_name = atc.table_name AND column_name = atc.column_name ) AS column_comments FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS atc WHERE 1 = 1
AND atc.owner = #owner#
AND atc.table_name = #tableName#
ORDER BY atc.owner , atc.table_name , atc.column_id
